title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 173.4 - Possession of raptors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 173.4 - Possession of raptors

State Regulations

The department may prohibit the possession of certain
raptors for falconry when such possession would present a threat to the species
or to the sport of falconry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
173.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
